title: Dunlending Ransacker (4C14)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	7

Game Text:	Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another [Dunland] Man to take control of a site.
Lore:	”'Yet there are many that cry in the Dunland tongue.'”
